name: Files Generator
description: Generate a stream of File objects from selected files and directories.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: filesAndDirs
parameters.description: Files and directories to generate File objects from.

parameters.name: fileOrDir
parameters.label: File or Dir
parameters.description: Path to file, or directory to generate File objects from.

parameters.name: extensions
parameters.description: The extensions to filter files in directories for. Directly selected files are not subject to this filter.

parameters.name: Extension
parameters.description: An extension to filter files in directories for.

parameters.name: recursive
parameters.description: If true, the directories will be searched recursively.
